DOC.brief_title: Fully Automated Anesthesia , Analgesia Fluid Management
DOC.detailed_description: Evaluate feasibility quality automate anesthesia , analgesia fluid management base combination several physiological variable ( bispectral index [ BIS ] , stroke volume [ SV ] , stroke volume variation [ SVV ] ) use 2 independent physiologic closed-loop system ( PCLS ) patient undergo high risk vascular surgery . All patient receive total intravenous anesthesia target control infusion mode use population pharmacokinetic set Schnider propofol Minto remifentanil target effect-site concentration . Infusion Toolbox 95 version 4.11 software ( Free University Brussels , Brussels , Belgium ) implement personal computer serve platform : calculate effect-site concentration propofol remifentanil ; display effect-site concentration estimate real time ; provide user interface permit entry patient ' demographic data ( sex , age , weight , height ) modification target concentration ; control propofol remifentanil infusion pump ( Alaris Medical , Hampshire , United Kingdom ) ; record calculate effect-site drug concentration . All patient receive baseline crystalloid infusion ( PlasmaLyte , Baxter , Belgium ) deliver pump rate 3 mL/ kg/h ( Fresenius Kabi , Belgium ) . Additional fluid give use goal-directed fluid therapy protocol guide cardiac output monitor ( EV-1000 ; Edwards Lifesciences ) consist 100 mL bolus ( Voluven , Fresenius Kabi , Germany ) deliver PCLS ( Learning Intravenous Resuscitator [ LIR ] ) . For fluid output , Q-Core Sapphire Multi-Therapy Infusion Pump ( Q-Core , Israel ) control LIR use software provide Q-Core via serial connection ( Commands Server R.01 ) . If hypotension occur ( define mean arterial pressure < 20 % baseline blood pressure ) fluid deliver LIR , treat anesthesiologist use vasopressor drug . In pilot study , close loop also operate independently , guide respective input ( BIS propofol ; SV SVV fluid bolus ) . The investigator also measure analgesia use PhysioDoloris monitoring device ( MDoloris Medical Systems , Lille , France ) .
